ScenarioDef.label: The Cosmic Scourge
ScenarioDef.description: For as long as you can remember, you have been a void spawn - "cosmic scourge" who roam in the boundless space for thousands of years, You followed your group consciousness, shared thoughts with other void spawns. Now, your group let you split and build a new consciousness on nearby planets. Then you disconnected with your group, intercepted a human spaceship, controlled it to fell into this unknown rimworld.\n\nNote: Since void spawn is an over-powered specie, you should add more unfair difficulties for more fun experience.

scenario.summary: One void spawn attempt to build new consciousness.

li.text: The ship fell apart upon the atmosphere. You grabbed a ripped metal, safely landed on the surface of high gravity.
